author: gcolvin
content:
Hello.  My usual plea.  Is there a Meta EIP for EOF yet?  If not:
* Please remind me where the hackkmd is.
* Please, please, please somebody write the Meta!

author: gcolvin
content:
Thanks!  It's better than the last one I looked at, but still not up to the quality of a Meta, and a lot harder for people to find.  And it makes it look like implementing EOF would be far more difficult than it is, and with no motivation given to explain why we should make these changes.

I have a lot more interest and background than most people, but it would take a lot more time than I have to understand this enough to review it, let alone implement it.  Devs with less motivation and background will, I strongly suspect, be right back to the reaction to EIP-615 years ago -- it looks too complicated and what is the point anyway?
